item.title: How to use custom typefaces in ggplot2 [macOS only]
item.description: I keep hitting my head against this particular (and seemingly simple) task: using custom typefaces in ggplot2 plots and being able to knit to PDF. The main reason for why I would want to do that is that I often find myself in need of including IPA symbols in plots (more often than not, itâ€™s vowels) and that I want those plots to be included in a knitted PDF.
